main_definition: The act of carrying out a task, duty or function with skill, proficiency, and effectiveness; also refers to the execution of an artistic work such as a play, concert, or dance performance.

meanings_and_examples.example: The actors' performances were praised for their emotional depth and authenticity.
Her guitar solo was one of the highlights of that night, captivating the audience with her powerful performance.
The ballet company's rendition of 'Swan Lake' received standing ovations for its grace and technical precision.
His film performance earned him critical acclaim, with many noting his convincing portrayal of a troubled character.
The basketball team's final playoff performances were marked by both triumph and controversy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Job or work performance in the professional context
meanings_and_examples.example: Her consistent high-quality work performance has made her a valuable asset to the company.
